directions: Whisk first 4 ingredients in medium bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Season vinaigrette with salt and pepper.
Mix watercress, fennel and tomatoes in large bowl. Toss with enough vinaigrette to coat. Season salad to taste with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: 2 medium fennel bulbs, trimmed, very thinly sliced lengthwise (about 3 cups)
title: Tomato, Fennel and Watercress Salad with Fennel-Tarragon Vinaigrette
